references: M. A. Nyblom, Some curious sequences ..., Am. Math. Monthly 109 (#6, 200), 559-564, Th. 3.1.
links: R. Stephan, Table of generating functions
formula: a(n) = n*(floor(log_2 n) + 3) - 2^((floor (log_2 n)) + 1).a(n) = n+a(floor[n/2])+a(ceiling[n/2]) = n+min{a(k)+a(n-k):0<k<n} = n+A003314(n). - _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 03 2002A001855(n) + 2n-1. a(n) = b(n)+1 with b(0)=0, b(2n) = b(n)+b(n-1)+2n+2, b(2n+1) = 2b(n)+2n+3. - _Ralf Stephan_, Oct 24 2003
maple: A033156 := proc(n) option remember; if n=1 then 1 else A033156(n-1)+floor(A033156(n-1)/(n-1))+2; fi; end;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 05 2002
